mapper.select: select ra.request_id, ra.solver_id, m1.nickname, m2.nickname, ra.status as acceptStatus, r.*, category_name from request_accept ra inner join request r on ra.request_id = r.request_id inner join member m1 on m1.member_id = ra.solver_id inner join member m2 on m2.member_id = r.member_id inner join category c on c.category_id = r.category_id where solver_id = #{solverId} and r.status = '대기중'
